resources.string: Go to the Settings Page—Language and Input to activate the AEIOU Keyboard™ and choose it as your default keyboard.
Put a \u2713 on AEIOU Keyboard™ to activate. Click on Default and choose AEIOU Keyboard™. Click Return \u23CE on your device to return to this instructions page.

Click here to install the AEIOU Keyboard™. Standard security instructions for installing all apps will appear. Allow the installation on all screens. Check box to install the keyboard. Then press Return on your cell phone or tablet to return to this screen.
Click here to set the default keyboard. Select the AEIOU Keyboard™. Press Return on your cell phone or tablet to return to this page.

Click Return on your cell phone or tablet. On your Apps Screen select your Email or word processing program you wish to use. The AEIOU Keyboard™ will be your keyboard. (To reinstall the QWERTY keyboard press the World Globe key on the AEIOU Keyboard™ to go to the Settings-Language and Input Screen.)
Thank you for selecting the AEIOU Keyboard™ Happy typing! The Development Staff.

Changing keyboards: To reinstall the QWERTY keyboard, press the World Globe key on the AEIOU Keyboard™. \nTo again install the AEIOU Keyboard™ click on the AEIOU app icon to go to the Settings Page.

Thank you for selecting the AEIOU Keyboard™.\nThe Development Staff
